svg.script: function hghl(el) { for ( var i in el ){ var elem = document.getElementById(el[i]); if ( elem != null ) elem.setAttribute('class','highlight'); } } function uhghl(el) { for ( var i in el ){ var elem = document.getElementById(el[i]); if ( elem != null ) elem.setAttribute('class','unhighlight'); } }

text.tspan: Comments as mouse-over tips, zoom and pan.Read column and table comments by hovering the columns and tables. Zoom with CTRL+whell mouse button, pan by dragging the diagram with the right-mouse button
by DbSchema.com - Wise CodersDbSchema is an universal database designer. DbSchema has a free Community Edition.

path.onmouseover: hghl(['Authorisation_Authorisation - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Authorisation.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.onmouseout: uhghl(['Authorisation_Authorisation - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Authorisation.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.title: 🔗 Foreign Key Authorisation - Employee Core Authorisation ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )
🔗 Foreign Key Authorisation - Employee Core Authorisation ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )

path.onmouseover: hghl(['Employee Extended_Employee Extended - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Extended.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employee Extended_Employee Extended - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Extended.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.title: 🔗 Foreign Key Employee Extended - Employee Core Employee Extended ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )
🔗 Foreign Key Employee Extended - Employee Core Employee Extended ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )

path.onmouseover: hghl(['Employee Role_Employee Role - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Role.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employee Role_Employee Role - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Role.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.title: 🔗 Foreign Key Employee Role - Employee Core Employee Role ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )
🔗 Foreign Key Employee Role - Employee Core Employee Role ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )

path.onmouseover: hghl(['Employer Address_Employer Address - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employer Address.Empoyee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employer Address_Employer Address - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employer Address.Empoyee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.title: 🔗 Foreign Key Employer Address - Employee Core Employer Address ref Employee Core ( Empoyee ID -> Employee ID )
🔗 Foreign Key Employer Address - Employee Core Employer Address ref Employee Core ( Empoyee ID -> Employee ID )

path.onmouseover: hghl(['Employment_Employment - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employment.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employment_Employment - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employment.Employee ID','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
path.title: 🔗 Foreign Key Employment - Employee Core Employment ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )
🔗 Foreign Key Employment - Employee Core Employment ref Employee Core ( Employee ID )

a.title: Entity INSTANCE.Authorisation
⧉ ID * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Technical ID assigned through VC issuing process. Note - not stable; re-assigned with every revocation / re-issuing cycle.
⧉ Issue Date * date
⧉ Employee ID * varchar(30) ↗ Authorisation( Employee ID ) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Exact string match required for reference (upper/lower case, whate spaces, ...).
🔗 References Employee Core ( Employee ID )
⧉ Authorisation ID * int ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> review - separate identifier required?
⧉ Authorisation Type * varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> Review - valid value set? Alternatively use predefined code instead of free text.
Entity INSTANCE.Employee Core ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Common core information for employee. >> review - separation of person (role employee) and employer (organization) information
⧉ ID * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Technical ID assigned through VC issuing process. Note - not stable; re-assigned with every revocation / re-issuing cycle.
⧉ Issue Date * date ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Issue of VC.

text.onmouseover: hghl(['Employee Extended_Employee Extended - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Extended.Employee ID','Employment_Employment - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employment.Employee ID','Employee Role_Employee Role - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Role.Employee ID','Authorisation_Authorisation - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Authorisation.Employee ID','Employer Address_Employer Address - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employer Address.Empoyee ID'])
text.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employee Extended_Employee Extended - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Extended.Employee ID','Employment_Employment - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employment.Employee ID','Employee Role_Employee Role - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Role.Employee ID','Authorisation_Authorisation - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Authorisation.Employee ID','Employer Address_Employer Address - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employer Address.Empoyee ID'])

a.title:
⧉ Employee ID * varchar(30) ↙ Employee Extended( Employee ID ) ↙ Employment( Employee ID ) ↙ Employee Role( Employee ID ) ↙ Authorisation( Employee ID ) ↙ Employer Address( Employee ID ) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ ID assigned by employer.
Employee ID must be known to issue certificate - used as reference by extended certificates.

🔗 Referred by Employee Extended ( Employee ID ) Referred by Employment ( Employee ID ) Referred by Employee Role ( Employee ID ) Referred by Authorisation ( Employee ID ) Referred by Employer Address ( Empoyee ID -> Employee ID )
⧉ Name * varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Aliases - last name, family name
⧉ Given Name * varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Alias - first name
⧉ Birth Date date ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Alias - date of birth (DOB)
⧉ Employer * varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Employer name (note - alternatively, an employer number could be used).
⧉ Employment Date * date ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Based on contract.
⧉ Leave Date date
Entity INSTANCE.Employee Extended

use.title: 🔑 Pk pk_Employee Extended ( ID, Employee ID )

a.title: ⧉ ID * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Technical ID assigned through VC issuing process. Note - not stable; re-assigned with every revocation / re-issuing cycle.
⧉ Issue Date * date

use.title: 🔑 Pk pk_Employee Extended ( ID, Employee ID )

text.onmouseover: hghl(['Employee Extended_Employee Extended - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
text.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employee Extended_Employee Extended - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])

a.title: ⧉ Employee ID * varchar(30) ↗ Employee Extended( Employee ID ) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Exact string match required for reference (upper/lower case, whate spaces, ...).
🔗 References Employee Core ( Employee ID )
⧉ Employer * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Redundant onformation of «Employee Core». >> Review - remove
⧉ Operation Site varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Free text - address or similar.
⧉ Activity Tyoe varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Free text. >> Review - optionally based on list of values
⧉ Contact Name varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ First name, last name >> Review - what is the exact purpose of the contact? More than one contact for different activities? >> Review - reference to person
⧉ Contact Phone varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> Review - reference to person
⧉ Contact Mail varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> Review - reference to person
Entity INSTANCE.Employee Role

use.title: 🔑 Pk pk_Employee Role ( ID, Employee ID )

a.title: ⧉ ID * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Technical ID assigned through VC issuing process. Note - not stable; re-assigned with every revocation / re-issuing cycle.
⧉ Issue Date * date

use.title: 🔑 Pk pk_Employee Role ( ID, Employee ID )

text.onmouseover: hghl(['Employee Role_Employee Role - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
text.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employee Role_Employee Role - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])

a.title: ⧉ Employee ID * varchar(30) ↗ Employee Role( Employee ID ) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Exact string match required for reference (upper/lower case, whate spaces, ...).
🔗 References Employee Core ( Employee ID )
⧉ Role varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> Review - valid value set? Alternatively use predefined code instead of free text.
⧉ Function varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> Review - valid value set? Alternatively use predefined code instead of free text.
⧉ Organisational Unit varchar(100) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> Review - valid value set? Alternatively use predefined code instead of free text.
Entity INSTANCE.Employer Address

use.title: 🔑 Pk pk_Employer Address ( ID, Empoyee ID )

a.title: ⧉ ID * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Technical ID assigned through VC issuing process. Note - not stable; re-assigned with every revocation / re-issuing cycle.
⧉ Issue Date * date

use.title: 🔑 Pk pk_Employer Address ( ID, Empoyee ID )

text.onmouseover: hghl(['Employer Address_Employer Address - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])
text.onmouseout: uhghl(['Employer Address_Employer Address - Employee Core','INSTANCE.Employee Core.Employee ID'])

a.title: ⧉ Empoyee ID * bigint ↗ Employer Address( Employee ID ) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Exact string match required for reference (upper/lower case, whate spaces, ...).
🔗 References Employee Core ( Empoyee ID -> Employee ID )
⧉ Street Address varchar(100)
⧉ Postal Code varchar(10)
⧉ City varchar(100)
Entity INSTANCE.Employment ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Employment information of a person (employee).
⧉ ID * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Technical ID assigned through VC issuing process. Note - not stable; re-assigned with every revocation / re-issuing cycle.
⧉ Issue Date * date
⧉ Employee ID * varchar(30) ↗ Employment( Employee ID ) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Exact string match required for reference (upper/lower case, whate spaces, ...).
🔗 References Employee Core ( Employee ID )
⧉ Contract Type * enum(up to 364 days, 365 days and more)
⧉ Weekly Work Hours * int ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ According to contract.
⧉ Salary * bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Annual base salary, CHF.
⧉ Entry Date date ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ First working day.
⧉ Risk Group varchar(50) ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Official risk classification as provided by insurance industry.
Entity INSTANCE.Organization ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ >> review - need for organization entity / credential (in employer role)?
⧉ ID bigint ⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯⎯ Technical ID assigned through VC issuing process. Note - not stable; re-assigned with every revocation / re-issuing
⧉ Issue Date date
⧉ Name * varchar(100)
⧉ Street Address varchar(100)
⧉ Postal Code varchar(15)
⧉ City varchar(100)

text.tspan: >> review - separation of person (role employee) and employer (organization) information
>> review - need for organization entity / credential (in employer role)?
In this locial schema, attributes with given value sets are represented as free text.
This is acceptable for plain internal informational purposes.
Nevertheless, in the phyiscal schema, tables with valid values shall be referenced.
In case of information exchange with external organizations,
semantic interoperability must be ensured through mutually agreed value sets.
